title: Are Hextech Chests currently disabled on public NA?

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: Whenever I try to open a Hextech Chest that I bought the open button is grey'd out. I am aware that there is a bug currently regarding an error message whenever you first log into the loot system, but I seem to have been unaffected by it. Has Riot disabled box openings because of this? Attached is a photo of what my loot screen looks like whenever I try to open the boxes.

replies.body: Hey JulesYule,  I'm not seeing any keys on your account.  I do see you have some chests, but you have no keys to unlock them.  You'll want to find key fragments to fuse a key together, or grab some from the store!
